scripts.clean: npx tsc -b --clean && npx shx rm -rf dist lib
scripts.build: npx cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=4096 yarn rsbuild build --mode production
scripts.serve: npx tsc -b --clean && npx shx rm -rf dist lib && npx orutil build && npx cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=4096 yarn rsbuild dev --mode development
scripts.serveNoModelBuild: npx tsc -b --clean && npx cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=4096 yarn rsbuild dev --mode development
